column5: Students are not admitted to the master’s degree program but may transfer to an MS degree plan if they are in good academic standing for the MS program and have made sufficient progress toward the MS degree. This is an option for graduate students who are not in good academic standing for the PhD program or who have decided to leave the program.RequirementsLanguage RequirementThe department does not require foreign language proficiency for the master's
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
